name: Usage
description: As part of this data store, metrics related to Hits (Edge/Midgress/Origin), Volume (Edge/Midgress/Origin), and Edge Responses are available by dimensions like Time, CP Code, Content Type, File Extension, and File Size Bucket. Data is available at a minimum granularity of 1 day.

dimensions.name: Time
dimensions.description: Indicates the time at which content was consumed. Akamai automatically sets this dimension.
dimensions.helpText: Indicates the time at which content was consumed. Akamai automatically sets this dimension.

dimensions.name: CPCode
dimensions.description: Content Provider code (CPCode) is an identifier assigned to a contract and used for reporting, billing and monitoring traffic served.
dimensions.helpText: Content Provider code (CPCode) is an identifier assigned to a contract and used for reporting, billing and monitoring traffic served.

dimensions.name: Content Type
dimensions.description: The value of the HTTP content type header served to the client.
dimensions.helpText: The value of the HTTP content type header served to the client.

dimensions.name: File Extension
dimensions.description: File extension of the object requested. Akamai extracts this from the URL of the requested object.
dimensions.helpText: File extension of the object requested. Akamai extracts this from the URL of the requested object.

dimensions.name: File Size Bucket
dimensions.description: The number of bytes and the size of objects requested, categorized in buckets of various sizes.
dimensions.helpText: The number of bytes and the size of objects requested, categorized in buckets of various sizes.

metrics.name: Edge Hits
metrics.description: All hits to the edge servers from the end users.
metrics.helpText: All hits to the edge servers from the end users.

metrics.name: Midgress Hits
metrics.description: Midgress traffic includes hits from edge servers to other edge servers.
metrics.helpText: Midgress traffic includes hits from edge servers to other edge servers.
